definition.text: Click the help button on the Trading Parameters node to access the node's Docs page. I'm going to show you something...

paragraphs.text: Scroll the page all the way to the bottom until you find the Trading Parameters Attaching Rules title.
Each node may be attached to certain node types. These attaching rules are listed on the node's page in the Docs.

When there are several nodes that may accept the connection, each candidate displays a grey ring indicating their readiness to take the attachment. Only the candidate closer to the node to be attached is highlighted in orange.
